title: Capitalize String
description: In this lab, we will explore a JavaScript function called `capitalize` that capitalizes the first letter of a string. The function uses array destructuring and `String.prototype.toUpperCase()` to achieve the desired result. We will also see how to use the `lowerRest` argument to convert the rest of the string to lowercase if needed.

verify.name: Open the Terminal/SSH and type 'node'
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
